definition.de: Diebstahl oder zerstörerisches Verhalten mithilfe eines Computers
definition.dk: Kriminel aktivitet, der primært udføres ved hjælp af computere og/eller internettet, for eksempel hacking, phishing og identitetstyveri.
definition.en-GB: Criminal activities carried out by means of computers or the Internet, such as hacking, phishing scams and identity theft
definition.en-US: Criminal activities carried out by means of computers or the Internet, such as hacking, phishing scams and identity theft
definition.pt-BR: Atividades criminosas cometidas através de computadores ou através da Internet, como hacking, roubo de entidade ou phishing.
definition.pt-PT: Atividades criminosas cometidas através de computadores ou através da Internet, como hacking, roubo de entidade ou phishing.
definition.se: Brottslig aktivitet som främst utförs genom att använda datorer och/eller internet, t ex hacking, phising och identitetsstölder.
definition.zh-Hans: 利用计算机或互联网进行的犯罪活动，如黑客、网络钓鱼欺诈和身份盗窃
